pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using fungal and natural materials: $(item)Nether Wart$(), $(item)Crimson Fungus$(), a $(tag)Sapling$(), and $(item)Vine$(). These ingredients embody nature's parasitic essence.

A reagent infused with the essence of nature's consumption. This catalyst can be combined with a $(item)Reinforced Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_leach)Sigil of Nature's Leach$().

pages.title: Philosophy
pages.text: Nature provides, and the wise mage takes what is needed. This reagent embodies the cycle of consumption - plant matter sustaining the practitioner of blood magic.$(br2)The resulting sigil allows you to drain life from the natural world to restore your own vitality.
